name: Sk-quality-assurance-app
tagline: The Rails Tutorial Sample App, 2nd Edition
body:
# Quality Assurance [food industry] app

This application was designed for food plant's QA department. It features user authentication, issue tracking with images and comments, email notifications, and PDF report generation.

live demo: http://skfoodgroup.herokuapp.com

![non-conformance processing system](http://note.io/1fubeDS)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
